metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32078 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.Description: An Out-of-Bounds Read was discovered in arch/arm/mach-footbridge/personal-pci.c in the Linux kernel through 5.12.11 because of the lack of a check for a value that shouldn't be negative, e.g., access to element -2 of an array, aka CID-298a58e165e4.
